dct_title_s: F. Leandri Alberti Bononiensis, Descriptio totius Italiae
dct_alternative_sm: F. Leandri Alberti Bononiensis, Descriptio totivs Italiae : qva sitvs, origines, imperia civitatvm
dct_description_sm: ex italica lingua nunc primum in latinam conuersa interprete Guilielmo Kyriandro Hoeningeno I C.
Translation of: Descrizione di tutta l'Italia.
First page and last 2 pages blank (included in page description).
Engraved title page, head and tail-pieces throughout.
"Cum privilegio sacræ Cæsareæ Maiestatis Regumq́. Franciæ ac Hispaniæ, quod exactius proxima docebit pagina" from title page.
Maps appear in Herberstein's Rerum Moscoviticarum commentarii, bound within volume, at the end.
Decorative cartouches and borders, coats of arms, descriptive text.
Illustrations of figures (including horsemen), buildings, ships, flora and fauna.
Map 1 is a bird's eye view of Moscow.

Rerum Moscoviticarum commentarii Sigismundi Liberi Baronis in Herberstain, Neyperg, & Guettenhag : quibus Russiae ac metropolis eius Moscoviae descriptio, chorographicae tabulae, religionis indicatio, modus excipiendi & tractandi oratores itineraria in Moscoviam duo & alia quaedam continentur. His nunc primum accedunt Scriptum recens de Graecorum fide, quos in omnibus Moscorum natio sequitur et Commentarius de bellis Moscorum adversus finitimos, Polonos, Lituanos, Suedos, Livonios & alios gestis ad annum usque LXXI scriptus ab Ioanne Leuuenclaio ... Basileae, ex officina Oporiniana. 1571.
